content.html: Having worked in open source for a majority of my career now, I can say that the “just send a pull request” meme downplays the cost of software maintenance. Maintainers need to deal with the ramifications of supporting this change when the contributor has moved on #oss
content.value: Having worked in open source for a majority of my career now, I can say that the “just send a pull request” meme downplays the cost of software maintenance. Maintainers need to deal with the ramifications of supporting this change when the contributor has moved on #oss
